segments.text: I see the boy reaching into the cookie jar, trying to get a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, standing on his tiptoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is there, waiting patiently for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the plate in his hand, ready to catch the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a little secret mission they're on together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink has no idea what's going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water overflowing, but it's like a backdrop to their adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a sweet moment between the two kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it and enjoy their cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
